avalancheActivity.highlights: Weak layers in the old snowpack represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment:
Avalanches can be released in the old snowpack. They are small and can be released in isolated cases by a single winter sport participant. Caution is to be exercised on very steep shady slopes above approximately 2500 m, and on wind-loaded slopes. The wind slabs are small.
Slight increase in danger of moist snow slides as a consequence of warming.
The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some localities 2 to 5 cm of snow has fallen since Wednesday above approximately 1500 m. The weather conditions gave rise to slight moistening of the snowpack in all aspects below approximately 2000 m.
Weak layers exist in the centre of the snowpack. The wind slabs have bonded generally well with the old snowpack.
At low and intermediate altitudes from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying.

tendency.highlights: As a consequence of new snow and wind the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent on Sunday. Slight increase in avalanche danger.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Weak layers in the old snowpack represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment:
Avalanches can be released in the old snowpack. In isolated cases they are medium-sized and can be released by a single winter sport participant. Caution is to be exercised in particular on steep shady slopes above approximately 2300 m, and on wind-loaded slopes. The wind slabs are mostly small.
Slight increase in danger of moist snow slides as a consequence of warming.
The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In some localities 5 to 10 cm of snow has fallen since Wednesday above approximately 1500 m. The weather conditions gave rise to slight moistening of the snowpack in all aspects below approximately 2000 m.
Weak layers exist in the centre of the snowpack. The wind slabs have bonded generally well with the old snowpack.
At intermediate and high altitudes snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.

tendency.highlights: As a consequence of new snow and wind the prevalence and size of the avalanche prone locations will increase on Sunday. Gradual increase in avalanche danger.

avalancheActivity.highlights: In all altitude zones from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.comment:
The snowpack will be generally stable.
Very isolated avalanche prone locations are to be found at intermediate and high altitudes and on very steep slopes. The avalanches in these loacations are small and can be released in isolated cases by a single winter sport participant. Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.
The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: In some localities 2 to 5 cm of snow has fallen since Wednesday above approximately 1500 m. In all altitude zones only a little snow is now lying.

tendency.highlights: Slight increase in danger of moist snow slides as a consequence of warming.

regions.name: B - VALLI DI GRESSONEY, AYAS, CHAMPORCHER
